bibwrap module¶

@author: Félix Bélanger-Robillard

class bibwrap.BiBlerWrapper[source]¶

Bases: object

static addEntry(bibtex)[source]¶

Takes a BibTeX string and outputs the corresponding EntryDict @type bibtex: L{str} @param bibtex: The BibTeX string to be processed. @return: L{EntryDict}.

static bibtexToCSV(bibtex)[source]¶

Takes a BibTeX string and outputs a .csv file @type bibtex: L{str} @param bibtex: The BibTeX string to be processed. @return: SQL file.

static bibtexToHTML(bibtex)[source]¶

Takes a BibTeX string and outputs a .html file @type bibtex: L{str} @param bibtex: The BibTeX string to be processed. @return: SQL file.

static bibtexToSQL(bibtex)[source]¶

Takes a BibTeX string and outputs a SQL table @type bibtex: L{str} @param bibtex: The BibTeX string to be processed. @return: SQL file.

static bibtexTobibtex(bibtex)[source]¶

Takes a BibTeX string and outputs a .bib file @type bibtex: L{str} @param bibtex: The BibTeX string to be processed. @return: SQL file.

static formatBibtex(bibtex)[source]¶

Takes a BibTeX string and outputs a formatted BibTeX @type bibtex: L{str} @param bibtex: The BibTeX string to be processed. @return: boolean .

static previewEntry(bibtex)[source]¶

Takes a BibTeX string and outputs an HTML preview @type bibtex: L{str} @param bibtex: The BibTeX string to be processed. @return: str.

static validateEntry(bibtex)[source]¶

Takes a BibTeX string and outputs 1 if the entry is valid or 0 if it’s not @type bibtex: L{str} @param bibtex: The BibTeX string to be processed. @return: boolean .
